properties.name: expanded
properties.description: Defines if the section should be by default expanded or collapsed.
properties.rawdescription: Defines if the section should be by default expanded or collapsed.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label to show as headline of the section
properties.rawdescription: The label to show as headline of the section

properties.name: priority
properties.description: The priority. Default settings from hookWidget will have priority 0.
properties.rawdescription: The priority. Default settings from hookWidget will have priority 0.
